file_content.text: We preserve. We cleanse.
Cleanse that.
Knights of Zakuul. Must have been on the Eternal Fleet.
I don't think they came by choice any more than we did.
They were prisoners, like us.
Enemies or not, I wanted them alive to answer questions.
It's too bad they can't talk.
I'm glad the enemy followed us. Fighting droids gets dull.
Good. We won't get bored.
Something dumped us together for a reason. Some kind of test?
You don't write, you don't holo... Was it something I said?
Definitely not. My comm's been offline. How'd you get a signal?
Commander, come in. It's Theron.
I read you. My comm's been offline. How'd you get a signal?
Dumb luck and smart tech. Are you having the same creepy day I am? Knocked out by a bright light on the Gravestone, woke up alone on this weird planet?
Until now, I feared the worst. If you and Torian are alive, that gives me hope for the others.
We're less alone, now.
Whatever happened up there saved our lives... for now, anyway.
I'm with Torian. We just ran into some Knights of Zakuul and a whole lot of angry droids. You?
Things got even stranger.
My day hasn't been nearly that dramatic. I feel neglected.
Spare me your diary. I found Torian. Where is my ship? Where is Vaylin?
Give me facts, not chatter.
I haven't seen either of them since I got here.
I found a... museum? Temple? Whatever, it's secure. I'll send you the coordinates.
The best news I've heard all day. Find the others and tell them where to meet us.
Excellent work, Theron.
Already on it. You and Torian be safe out there.
Careful. From what I've seen so far, nothing on this world's exactly what it appears.
You can't be sure it's safe.
Maybe, but we need a rallying point we can defend. I'll see if I can bring the others here, too.
Gather my forces and make sure they're ready. We will fight our way off this world.
Summon the team. Prep for war.
Understood. I'll keep scanning. Keep your eyes open out there.
Vaylin was on the Gravestone with us. If we're here, so is she.
Vaylin.
You don't have to struggle. Let me help you.
Thexan?
I missed you, little sister.
Agh!
I hate it when we take separate vacations. A holocall's never enough.
I need to see you in person.
No, it sure isn't. Let's fix that.
